content:
I’m interested in exploring the idea of running a prover operation to support this new zk-EVM effort. I’m wondering if there’s a chance this could become a viable business model in the future, similar to how staking providers operate today.

This is probably the wrong place to ask, but if anyone has thoughts on whether there will be a sustainable role for independent provers, or can point me to good resources or communities discussing this, I’d really appreciate it.

Thanks a lot!
